Docs.summary: Extension methods for the MonoTouch.SystemConfiguration.StatusCode enumeration.

remarks.para: The extension method for the MonoTouch.SystemConfiguration.StatusCode enumeration can be used to fetch the error domain associated with these error codes.

Docs.summary: Returns the error domain associated with the MonoTouch.SystemConfiguration.StatusCode value
